N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7006.10 - Appeal procedures

State Regulations
(a) The
inmate shall have the right to appeal the hearing officer's disposition and any
sanction to the chief administrative officer. Such appeal shall be submitted in
writing within two business days of the inmate's receipt of the disposition, specifying the grounds for the appeal. (b) All appeals shall be reviewed and decided
within five business days after receipt and each inmate shall be notified in
writing of the results. (c) The
chief administrative officer may reduce or suspend all or part of the sanction, but not increase it. Notes
